trans-unit.source: Provides a substitute for <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo" /> by modifying the definitions of <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeOfImplType(System.Int32,System.IntPtr@)" /> and <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeInfo(System.IntPtr,Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过修改 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo" /> 和 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeOfImplType(System.Int32,System.IntPtr@)" /> 的定义来提供 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo.GetRefTypeInfo(System.IntPtr,Microsoft.Build.Tasks.IFixedTypeInfo@)" /> 的替代项。

trans-unit.source: Identifier for the member.
trans-unit.target: 成员的标识符。

trans-unit.target: 要使用的调用的类型。

trans-unit.target: 地址要返回的位置。

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.CreateInstance(System.Object,System.Guid@,System.Object@)" />。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the location of the ITypeLib interface.
trans-unit.target: ITypeLib 接口的位置要返回的位置。

trans-unit.target: 该索引要返回的位置。

trans-unit.target: 文档的名称。

trans-unit.target: 该帮助文章的上下文编号。

trans-unit.target: 成员的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the name.
trans-unit.target: 该名称要返回的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes allocated at rgBstrNames.
trans-unit.target: 在 rgBstrNames 分配的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the number of names.
trans-unit.target: 名称数要返回的位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetNames(System.Int32,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Int32@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetNames(System.Int32,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Int32@)" />。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the referenced type description to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的被引用类型说明的句柄。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the referenced type description.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含被引用的类型说明。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the referenced type descriptions if a type description references other type descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 检索被引用的类型说明（如果该类型说明引用其他类型说明）。

trans-unit.source: The index of the implemented type whose handle is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回其句柄的已实现类型的索引。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to a handle for the implemented interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含对已实现接口的句柄的引用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type description of the implemented interface types if a type description describes a COM class.
trans-unit.target: 检索实现的接口类型的类型说明（如果类型说明描述 COM 类）。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the type attributes.
trans-unit.target: 类型特性要返回的位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeAttr(System.IntPtr@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeAttr(System.IntPtr@)" />。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the type comp.
trans-unit.target: 类型 comp 要返回的位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeComp(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeComp@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetTypeComp(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeComp@)" />。

trans-unit.source: Index of the variable.
trans-unit.target: 变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Location to return the description.
trans-unit.target: 该说明要返回的位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetVarDesc(System.Int32,System.IntPtr@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.GetVarDesc(System.Int32,System.IntPtr@)" />。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an instance of the interface described by this type description.
trans-unit.target: 指向此类型说明描述的接口的实例的指针。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the interface member.
trans-unit.target: 标识接口成员。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the invoke call, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 描述 Invoke 调用的上下文的标志，如下：

trans-unit.source: DISPATCH_METHOD if the member is accessed as a method.
trans-unit.target: DISPATCH_METHOD 如果把该成员作为方法访问。

trans-unit.source: If there is ambiguity, both this and the DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET flag can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在多义性，则可以同时设置此标志和 DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET 标志。

trans-unit.source: DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET if the member is retrieved as a property or data member.
trans-unit.target: DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET 如果把此成员作为属性或数据成员进行检索。

trans-unit.source: DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT if the member is changed as a property or data member.
trans-unit.target: DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT 如果把此成员作为属性或数据成员进行更改。

trans-unit.source: DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF if the member is changed by using a reference assignment, rather than a value assignment.
trans-unit.target: DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF 如果通过使用引用分配而不是值分配更改此成员。

trans-unit.source: This value is only valid when the property accepts a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: 此值仅当属性接受对对象的引用时才有效。

trans-unit.source: Points to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.
trans-unit.target: 指向结构，该结构包含一个参数数组、一个命名参数的 DISPID 数组和每个数组中元素数的计数。

trans-unit.source: Should be Null if the caller does not expect any result.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方不需要任何结果，则应为 Null。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should be a pointer to the location at which the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它应该是指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

trans-unit.source: If wFlags specifies DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT or DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF, pVarResultis ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 wFlags 指定 DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT 或 DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF，则忽略 pVarResultis。

trans-unit.source: Points to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if DISP_E_EXCEPTION is returned.
trans-unit.target: 指向异常信息结构的指针，该结构仅在返回 DISP_E_EXCEPTION 时才被填充。

trans-unit.source: If pExcepInfois Null on input, only an HRESULT error will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pExcepInfois 在输入中为 Null，则将只返回 HRESULT 错误。

trans-unit.source: If Invoke returns DISP_E_TYPEMISMATCH, puArgErr indicates the index (within rgvarg) of the argument with incorrect type.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用返回 DISP_E_TYPEMISMATCH，则 puArgErr 指示具有错误类型的参数的索引（在 rgvarg 中）。

trans-unit.source: If more than one argument returns an error, puArgErr indicates only the first argument with an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个参数返回错误，则 puArgErr 仅指示第一个具有错误的参数。

trans-unit.source: Arguments in pDispParams->rgvarg appear in reverse order, so the first argument is the one having the highest index in the array.
trans-unit.target: pDispParams->rgvarg 中的参数采用逆序显示，因此第一个参数是数组中具有最大索引的参数。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be Null.
trans-unit.target: 不能为 Null。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.Invoke(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int16,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DISPPARAMS@,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.Invoke(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int16,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DISPPARAMS@,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32@)" />。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the FUNCDESC to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 指向要释放的 FUNCDESC 的指针。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseFuncDesc(System.IntPtr)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseFuncDesc(System.IntPtr)" />。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the TYPEATTR to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 指向要释放 TYPEATTR 的指针。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseTypeAttr(System.IntPtr)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseTypeAttr(System.IntPtr)" />。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the VARDESC to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 指向要释放 VARDESC 的指针。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseVarDesc(System.IntPtr)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo.ReleaseVarDesc(System.IntPtr)" />。
